title: Money mad
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: An old miser is robbed and killed by two thugs, who subsequently kill one another as each tries to get all the loot. Cast includes Charles Inslee, George Gebhardt, Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
